title: Alexei Navalny - Wikipedia
snippet: They, in turn, stated they wanted to eventually see Navalny as a member of the party. On 15 December 2012 Navalny expressed his support of the party, saying, "The People's Alliance is my party", but again refused to join it, citing the criminal cases against him.

title: Russia of the Future - Wikipedia
snippet: Russia of the Future (Russian: Россия Будущего, romanized: Rossiya Budushchego, IPA: [rɐˈsʲijə ˈbudʊɕːɪvə]), originally known as the People's Alliance (Народный Альянс, Narodnyy Al'yans) and formerly called the Progress Party (Партия Прогресса, ...

title: Kremlin Foe Navalny Launches New Political Party
snippet: Russian opposition leader Aleksei Navalny has launched a new political party, though he missed its founding due to a jail sentence over nationwide protests he organized against President Vladimir Putin.

title: Europe: Alexei Navalny - A Fearless Democrat
snippet: He was the voice of the opposition, a fighter for democracy and transparency in an increasingly authoritarian Russia: Alexej Navalny. His fearless commitment against corruption and for political change has inspired millions. However, his path was also marked by dangers, and he lived out his ...

title: The political opposition in Russia - European Parliament
